entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Blind River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain or snow. High 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022
